xml_element.name: job.why
xml_element.title: Determine the state of a job
xml_element.author: ss

p.i: Only a part of this tree will be returned, depending on the job state

p.pre: <job.why> <obstacle state="..." /> <obstacle order_controlled="..." /> <obstacle max_tasks="..." /> <obstacle waiting_for_process="..." /> <obstacle scheduler_state="..." /> <obstacle in_period="..." /> <obstacle locks_available="..." /> <obstacle process_class_is_unknown="..." /> <obstacle process_class="..." /> <if_order_is_ready.why> <obstacle order_controlled="..." /> </if_order_is_ready.why> <job_chain_nodes.why> <job_chain_node.why state="..."> <job_chain.why path="..."> <obstacle to_be_removed="..." /> <obstacle replacement="..." /> <obstacle state="..." /> <obstacle max_orders="..." /> <order_queue.why length="..."> <order.why id="..."> <obstacle at="..." /> <obstacle setback="..." /> <obstacle onblacklist="..." /> <obstacle suspended="..." /> <obstacle is_replacement="..." /> <obstacle> <state /> </obstacle> </order> </order_queue> </job_chain.why> </job_chain_node.why> </job_chain_nodes.why> <start_reason.why next_single_start="..."> <obstacle max_tasks="..." /> <obstacle state="..." /> </start_reason.why> <start_reason.why once="..."> <obstacle in_period="..." /> <obstacle max_tasks="..." /> <obstacle state="..." /> </start_reason.why> <start_reason.why delay_until="..."> <obstacle now="..." /> </start_reason.why> <start_reason.why next_start_time="..."> <obstacle now="..." /> <obstacle in_period="..." /> <obstacle max_tasks="..." /> <obstacle state="..." /> </start_reason.why> <start_reason.why min_tasks="..."> <obstacle not_ending_tasks="..." /> <obstacle in_period="..." /> </start_reason.why> <start_when_directory_changed.why> <obstacle directory_changed="..." /> </start_when_directory_changed.why> <tasks.why> <task.why> <obstacle state="..." /> <obstacle> <state /> </obstacle> </task.why> </tasks.why> <task_queue.why length="..."> <task_queue_element.why at="..." id="..."> <obstacle in_period="..." force="..." /> </task_queue_element.why> </task_queue.why> </job.why>
